Description: The unique ID that links catchments to their respective flowlines or riparian buffers
The variable name corresponding to the "Name" column of the NHDHRDV2 Covariate Documentation spreadsheet
The spatial average of the variable within the zone
The area over which the values were spatially averaged. Options are either "local" for current zone or "upstream" for the entire contributing network zone
The distance of the riparian buffer, in feet. The value for catchments in this field is "NA"
